Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Riu Don Miguel - Adults Only in San Bartolome de Tirajana (Playa del Ingles), you'll be minutes from Yumbo Shopping Center and close to Kasbah Shopping Center. This eco-friendly hotel is within close proximity of CITA Shopping Center and Holiday World Maspalomas.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 251 air-conditioned rooms featuring plasma televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and ceiling fans.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a fitness center.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Hotel Riu Don Miguel - Adults Only in San Bartolome de Tirajana (Playa del Ingles), you'll be minutes from Yumbo Shopping Center and close to Kasbah Shopping Center. This eco-friendly hotel is within close proximity of CITA Shopping Center and Holiday World Maspalomas.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Yumbo Shopping Center - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Kasbah Shopping Center - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
CITA Shopping Center - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Holiday World Maspalomas - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Maspalomas Golf Course - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Maspalomas Beach - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Maspalomas Dunes - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Las Burras Beach - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Playa de San Agustin - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Aqualand Maspalomas - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Maspalomas Lighthouse - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Meloneras Beach - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
El Aguila Beach - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Palmitos Park - 9.1 km / 5.7 mi
Puerto Rico Marina - 13.1 km / 8.2 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Riu Don Miguel - Adults Only is Las Palmas (LPA-Gran Canaria) - 27 km / 16.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
